title: International visitor spending in Paris 2010 to 2018
yAxis: International visitor spending in billion U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes International visitor spending in billion U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 9.
Overall International visitor spending in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
International visitor spending in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2010 to 2012, slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2015, and lastly roughly increasing from 2015 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2014.
The highest International visitor spending in billion U.S. dollars, of value 19.5 was reached at Year 2013
The lowest International visitor spending in billion U.S. dollars, of value 12.03 was reported at Year 2016
